meanings.definition: A person who owns or manages a shop.
meanings.sent1: The shopkeepers in our town are friendly and helpful.
meanings.sent2: The shopkeepers on Main Street work hard to keep their businesses running smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The shopkeepers decided to have a race to see who could restock their shelves the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The shopkeepers were the guardians of the small town, always ready to lend a hand.
meanings.sent5: The shopkeepers greeted every customer with a warm smile and a helpful attitude.

meanings.sent1: Many shopkeepers gathered at the market to discuss business strategies.
meanings.sent2: The shopkeepers in the mall come from diverse backgrounds and cultures.
meanings.sent3: The shopkeepers formed a band and surprised everyone with their musical talents.
meanings.sent4: The shopkeepers stood together like a colorful mosaic, each bringing something unique to the group.
meanings.sent5: The shopkeepers' presence in the community was essential for its vibrant and bustling atmosphere.
